TEXT.S: = Thgahan = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Wanjungsyang ka alang Thgahan. 49 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 117 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 97% niqan 114 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 3% niqan 3 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Truku 59%, Amis 1%, Tayal 12%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq 14%, ni rahuq na o 12%.
